executiveSummary: Ben and Jen, co-founders of Toy Box, pitched their 3D printer designed for kids to the Sharks, seeking $150,000 for a 5% equity stake. After deliberations and multiple counteroffers, they accepted Kevin O’Leary’s deal for $150,000 in exchange for 13% equity plus 2% advisory shares.
keyDecisions: Toy Box accepted Kevin O’Leary’s offer of $150,000 for 13% equity and 2% advisory shares.

actionItems.task: Finalize investment agreement with Kevin O’Leary for $150,000, 13% equity, and 2% advisory shares
Begin discussions on potential licensing partnerships for branded toys (e.g., Disney, Minecraft, Marvel)
Continue expanding Toy Box’s toy library by adding 7–10 new toys per week

nextSteps: Toy Box will move forward with Kevin O’Leary as an investor, leveraging his business expertise and connections to pursue licensing opportunities and scale operations.
